content: a new pattern for the beginning crocheter to learn a few basics and finish a stylish and useful little bag you will need to practice single and double_crochet slip_stitch and decreases-all very easy steps once you work them a few times i chose a super bulky yarn-both samples are a chenille yarn very soft and cushy but you could also use something in a similar wt if you didn t want the fluff aspect it takes about 96 yds only about 2 yds left of the brett yarn but plenty of the universal brand so if you get something with 100 yds or so you ll be fine i will be using this pattern in my beginning crochet classes so that students will have something to show at the end of the class if you like this pattern please give me a heart here on ravelry i might make it to the top 20 ty
